articles.author: Anirudh Laskar
articles.title: South Africa's Sanlam hikes stake beyond 50% in Shriram's insurance JVs | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Sanlam Emerging Markets Mauritius will increase holding in Shriram General Insurance by 10.74% and in Shriram Life Insurance by 12.02%.
articles.content: Mumbai: Betting on Indias insurance growth potential, South African financial services giant Sanlam, on Friday, once again raised its holding in two of its Indian insurance joint ventures (JVs) with … [+3998 chars]
